dmca.title: DEMAND TO CEASE AND DESIST SENDING SMS MESSAGES TO
dmca.body:
Nextel Communications, Inc. and Nextel South Corp. ("Nextel") have become aware that you, or your affiliates, agents, or others acting under your direction, have sent hundreds of thousands of unsolicited and unwanted commercial short messages to wireless telephone numbers assigned to Nextel customers. Among other things, these messages advertise Nextel phone accessories available from www.ldencustom.com, which is wrongfully purported to be affiliated with Nextel.

This use of the Nextel network is unauthorized. Moreover, the volume of messages sent has burdened Nextel's network and adversely impacted Nextel's business operations. Nextel demands that you immediately cease and desist this unlawful transmission of text messages over Nextel's network.

Your access and use of Nextel's network, with the apparent intent to defraud recipients of the messages into believing that the communications were sent or authorized by Nextel, violates the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act, 18 U.S.C.
